data.name: Cafe Paris
data.detailed_description:
Welcome to a game about coffee and conversation. This is a 3D narrative coffee shop sim located in the heart of Paris. In this game you run "Cafe Paris". A 24/7 open coffee shop establishment between the foot of the Eiffel Tower & the banks of the Seine river. Serve coffee & food to your customers and learn about their stories.

- Greet customers that will come in at all times of the day.
- Serve them coffee and food.
- Enjoy the atmosphere of Paris as you serve and interact with customers all day and night with the Eiffel Tower in view.
- Speak with your patrons and learn their stories and where they come from. Each customer will have their own unique storyline that you can influence.

data.short_description: Welcome to a game about coffee and conversation. This is a 3D narrative coffee shop sim located in the heart of Paris. You run a 24/7 open coffee shop between the foot of the Eiffel Tower & the banks of the Seine river. Serve coffee & food to your customers and learn about their stories.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7 Or Later
  • Processor: 2.4GHZ Dual Core Processor Or Higher
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce 9800GT Or Equivalent
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
